sn7.22:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati khomadussaṃ nāmaṃ sakyānaṃ nigamo.
sn7.22:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya khomadussaṃ nigamaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn7.22:4.4: Tena kho pana samayena khomadussakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā sabhāyaṃ sannipatitā honti kenacideva karaṇīyena, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyati.
sn7.22:4.5: Atha kho bhagavā yena sā sabhā tenupasaṅkami.
sn7.22:4.6: Addasaṃsu khomadussakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn7.22:4.8: “ke ca muṇḍakā samaṇakā, ke ca sabhādhammaṃ jānissantī”ti?
sn7.22:4.9: Atha kho bhagavā khomadussake brāhmaṇagahapatike gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn7.22:5.2: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṃ;
sn7.22:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, khomadussakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn7.22:6.3: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
sn7.22:6.5: evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn7.22:6.6: Ete mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn7.22:6.7: Upāsake no bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate”ti.
